article_text:
Hospital's officials searching for options

Posted Jun. 27, 2014 at 7:45 AM

Updated Jun 27, 2014 at 7:46 AM



Coldwater, Mich.

article_metadata.description: By Don Reiddwreid@aol.comCOLDWATER  There is no good or clear option for financially faltering Community Health Center of Branch County to find a "strategic partner to protect and serve the long-term health care needs of the community," CHC trustees learned Wednesday night.Juniper Advisory LLC Vice President J. Jordan Shields outlined five options after three hospital organizations made final proposals following auditor’s restated 2013 financials. The balance sheet went from "break
